short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dedicated extension that turns Upwork into dark mode without hassle or privacy leaks. Also works with Upwork Community.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dedicated extension that turns Upwork into dark mode without hassle or privacy leaks. Also works with Upwork Community.

-Lightweight and automatic.
-Full privacy, no data is collected whatsoever. 
-Built for www.upwork.com and community.upwork.com
-Does exactly what it's supposed to: Turns entire Upwork into Dark Mode
-Help with development costs by donating via Paypal from the extension!
-Enjoy!

If you find errors or need changes, we are happy to help and update the extension!
